IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText:
LIST OF EXHIBITS
CyberTip 155057811
CyberTip 155161735
Endorsed Breezeline Subpoena 

NARRATIVE
On 2/11/2023 the Maryland State Police Internet Crimes Against Children (ICAC) task force received CyberTip "155057811 & 155161735" from the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children (NCMEC). The CyberTip, which was reported by Microsoft, was generated by the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children (NCMEC) due to Microsoft reporting that on 2/11/2023 at 06:23:38 UTC suspected child pornography was uploaded from an IP address geo-locating to Cumberland, MD.

Microsoft provided the following suspect information:

Peer-to-Peer Client: BingImage

TFC Mueller reviewed the CyberTips and observed child pornography. Listed below

CyberTip 155057811
File Name: 0f90bfee-f3f1-4696-92ae-7af7b389f6ac.jpg
Description:  This color image depicts two white young individuals (male and female), both approximately 8-14 years old, based on their sizes and physical development, having vaginal intercourse.
IP Address: 207.255.39.76 at 02-12-2023 19:45:37 UTC

File Name:  04111c6a-c59c-4e64-9b1d-df42d25256cc.jpg
Description: This image is the same as “0f90bfee-f3f1-4696-92ae-7af7b389f6ac.jpg”.
IP Address: 207.255.39.76 at 02-11-2023 06:23:38 UTC

CyberTip 155161735
File Name:  01e4220a-327b-4dbf-a4d1-53e70d475306.jpg
Description: This color image depicts two young teens, both approximately 12-15 years old, based on their size, having intercourse.
IP Address: 207.255.39.76 at 02-12-2023 19:45:37 UTC

A check through Maxmind shows the IP address is registered through Atlantic Broadband and Geo-Locates to Cumberland, Maryland.

On 2/15/2023 TFC Mueller authored a subpoena, for subscriber information, for Atlantic Broadband (Breezeline) and submitted it to the Howard County State’s Attorneys Office for endorsement.

On 2/16/2023 TFC Mueller received the endorsed Breezeline subpoena. On 2/17/2023 TFC Mueller submitted the subpoena to Breezeline.  

On 2/17/2023 TFC Mueller received the Breezeline subpoena response. Breezeline provided the following information:
Subscriber Name: WILLIAM ALLEN
Subscriber& Billing Address: 450 PINE AVE, CUMBERLAND, MD 21502
Account Activation Date: 09/01/2015
Account Deactivation Date: Account is active.
Associated Email Addresses: 56peggyallen@gmail.com
Associated Phone Numbers: 240-522-4270 301-759-3186


I request this investigation be transferred to TFC Cooke of the MSP CCU, due to him previously charging the suspect.

ATTACHMENTS:

- Signed Residential Search Warrant
- Signed Residential Search Warrant Inventory Return
- Property Record + Chain of Custody
- Room labels
- Miranda Waiver

NARRATIVE:

On 3/14/23, TFC Cooke authored a residential search warrant for 450 Pine Avenue, Cumberland, MD 21502 which was signed by a District Court Judge on the same day. Lucas Walker was currently incarcerated at the Allegany County Detention Center on related charges.

On 3/17/23 at 0732 hours, TFC Cooke along with other MSP investigators executed the search warrant of 450 Pine Avenue, Cumberland, MD. The following electronic devices were seized from the residence:

- black Sony PS4
- AVOLUSION External hard drive
- white Xbox Series S
- black Xbox
- white VR headset
- Omen gaming laptop
- Seagate hard drive

All seized property was submitted to the Digital Forensic Lab for analysis.

Present at the residence were the owners, William & Margaret Allen (WALKER'S grandparents), and Mikayla Day-Walker (WALKER'S spouse). Mikayla was read her Miranda Rights at 0740 hours and agreed to an interview. Mikayla advised that she had located child pornography on Walker's VR headset several weeks ago and subsequently reset the device to factory settings. Mikayla expressed that her relationship with Walker has suffered due to his pornography use and that he has not been supportive as a father to their newborn son. Mikayla pointed out several spots around the basement ceiling where Walker has hid electronic devices containing child pornography in the past. Mikayla advised that she has told Walker to stop looking at child pornography multiple times but to no effect. Mikayla advised that she is planning to move out of Walker's grandparents' house and find a more suitable home for her and her newborn son.

Case open - pending digital forensic analysis.
